channel.title: Items disappear when dropped
channel.description: How can i make it so ONLY owners can drop items without the item disappearing?

item.title: Items disappear when dropped
item.dc:creator: @lpxd lpxd
item.description:
@lpxd wrote:

Just change the delta methods to PI. eg sM = c.sendMessage. Also, I think that dropping items is not in client.java for pi… try serarching for it.

Read full topic

item.title: Items disappear when dropped
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

[quote=“kryst-scape, post:2, topic:381555”]If it is Delta, look in client.java for:

	public void dropItem(int droppedItem, int slot) {

Add this after that^:

if (playerRights !== 3) { sM( "You drop the " + getItemName(droppedItem) + ", it vanishes into the ground."); deleteItem(droppedItem, slot, playerItemsN[slot]); return ; }
(sorry about my terrible conventions.)
Anyway, THAT is basically saying, if your playerRights are NOT equal to 3, the item will disappear. And if they are 3, then you should be able to drop items.

If it doesn’t work, add me on my MSN and I will try and help you: tnt52196@yahoo.com[/quote]

We need more new people like you

Read full topic

item.title: Items disappear when dropped
item.dc:creator: @kryst-scape kryst-scape
item.description:
@kryst-scape wrote:

If it is Delta, look in client.java for:

	public void dropItem(int droppedItem, int slot) {

Add this after that^:

if (playerRights !== 3) { sM( "You drop the " + getItemName(droppedItem) + ", it vanishes into the ground."); deleteItem(droppedItem, slot, playerItemsN[slot]); return ; }
(sorry about my terrible conventions.)
Anyway, THAT is basically saying, if your playerRights are NOT equal to 3, the item will disappear. And if they are 3, then you should be able to drop items.

If it doesn’t work, add me on my MSN and I will try and help you: tnt52196@yahoo.com

Read full topic
